definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Da 2:18 secret (Targum id., Syr. roz, 0roz, ro0zo0; Pers. loan-word; = Phlv. rāž, N Pers. rāz Andr:M 83 *);—abs. ´[[ר]]: Da 4:6, emph. [[רָזׇא]] Da 2:18, Da 2:19, Da 2:27, Da 2:30, Da 2:47; pl. abs. [[רָזִין]] v:Da 2:28, v:Da 2:47, emph. [[רָזַיׇּא]] v:Da 2:29.
